snippet: The photos in Sunday's magazine of the stretch between New York and Washington that got whacked by Hurricane Sandy don't reveal anything about the hardship and heroics of the last week. But they do tell a powerful story about how the American economy...
abstract: The photos in Sunday's magazine of the stretch between New York and Washington that got whacked by Hurricane Sandy don't reveal anything about the hardship and heroics of the last week. But they do tell a powerful story about how the American economy has evolved over the last 50 years.

headline.main: This Sunday: Man-Made Devastation vs. Natural
